long_description: Designed for versatility, the Inova X3A light transitions easily between bike light and handheld LED flashlight thanks to a flexible mounting system. White LED outputs 175 lumens on high; switch to low to output 18 lumens and conserve battery power. Flashing mode helps alert others to your presence. Powered by 3 AAA batteries (included), the light runs up to 3 hrs. 30 min. on high and 49 hrs. on low. Water- and impact-resistant construction helps keep the light running throughout your adventures. Included rubber base mount is designed to cradle and secure the X3A light; base is also finish-friendly so it won't scratch up your handlebar. Mount without tools thanks to super-strong, durable and flexible 9 in. Gear Ties that can be easily bent to wrap around the light and your bike's handlebar. Gear Ties can be twisted and untwisted numerous times, letting you choose when and where to mount the X3A light-bikes, poles or straps-it can even be freestanding.
